name: Attesa Extra
author: AttesaWP

sections.description:
Attesa Extra add extra features to Attesa Theme like custom templates, widgets, elementor widgets and metaboxes to edit the structure of the website for each post/page. You can also import demo content with a click.
Attesa Extra requires free Attesa theme to be installed.

Credits & Copyright

Typed.js, Copyright 2014 Matt Bold

Licenses: MIT
Source: https://github.com/mattboldt/typed.js

Butterbean, Copyright 2015-2016 Justin Tadlock

Licenses: GNU General Public License v2.0
Source: https://github.com/justintadlock/butterbean

Licenses: GPLv3 https://github.com/kallookoo/wp-color-picker-alpha/blob/master/LICENSE
Source: https://github.com/kallookoo/wp-color-picker-alpha
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have Attesa Theme installed
  2. Upload the folder attesa-extra to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
I installed the plugin but it does not work

Make sure you have Attesa Theme installed because Attesa Extra is a plugin designed to work exclusively with free Attesa theme
